id.description: Revision identifier for the latest revision

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the latest revision in ISO 8601 format

content_model.description: Type of content on the page

url.description: URL of the applicable license based on the $wgRightsUrl setting

title.description: Name of the applicable license based on the $wgRightsText setting

html.description: Latest page content in HTML, following the HTML specification
